title: Data Science Fundamentals: Unveiling the Secrets from Data
description: Welcome to the exciting world of Data Science! This course equips you with the essential skills and knowledge to extract valuable insights from data.

learning_outcomes.title: Statistics and Probability Foundations
learning_outcomes.content: Master statistical concepts like hypothesis testing, central tendency, and probability distributions to analyze data effectively.

learning_outcomes.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
learning_outcomes.content: Explore core Machine Learning (ML) algorithms like linear regression, decision trees, and k-nearest neighbors. Understand how they learn from data and make predictions.

learning_outcomes.title: Data Wrangling and Cleaning
learning_outcomes.content: Learn techniques to wrangle and clean messy real-world data, preparing it for analysis using libraries like Pandas and NumPy.

learning_outcomes.title: Data Visualization
learning_outcomes.content: Create compelling data visualizations using libraries like Matplotlib and Seaborn to communicate insights effectively. Tell stories with your data!

learning_outcomes.title: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
learning_outcomes.content: Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) to uncover patterns, trends, and relationships within your data.

learning_outcomes.title: Introduction to Deep Learning
learning_outcomes.content: Get a foundational understanding of Deep Learning concepts like neural networks and their applications in various data science domains.

modules.title: Data Visualization
topics: Creating charts and graphs with Matplotlib

modules.title: Capstone Project
topics: Apply your skills to a real-world data science problem
